article.title: The SAMI Galaxy Survey: Data Release One with Emission-line Physics Value-Added Products

multiple_choice_question.text: What is the approximate redshift range of the SAMI-GAMA primary sample?
What does the distribution of black dots on the sky maps primarily represent?
choices: Galaxies included in Data Release One (DR1).
Targets excluded from DR1 due to quality control.
Primary targets of the complete field sample.

multiple_choice_question.text: What does the color coding of the spatially-resolved [NII]/Ha maps illustrate?
choices: The effective radius of the galaxy.
The gas excitation mechanism (star formation or AGN).
